title: White as Snow
description: His name was the essence of nightmares ... his domain the birthplace of despair. No sane man would venture there, but for the sake of her father's life, Bianca the Pure must willingly go to the embrace of the black knight ... Damian Alessandro. To break the curse holding him in thrall, Damian is willing to do anything, even seduce innocent Bianca Bordeaux. But he soon finds himself bewitched ... and in more peril than he could have ever imagined.... Rating: Contains explicit language and graphic sex.
author: Morgana de Winter
